parameters.name: Notes
parameters.description: The notes associated with the workload. For a review template, these are the notes that will be associated with the workload when the template is applied.

parameters.name: LensesToAssociate
parameters.description: A list of lens aliases or ARNs to apply to the review template. (string) --- The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1::lens/serverless. Note that some operations (such as ExportLens and CreateLensShare) are not permitted on Amazon Web Services official lenses. For custom lenses, this is the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-west-2:123456789012:lens/0123456789abcdef01234567890abcdef. Each lens is identified by its  LensSummary$LensAlias.

parameters.name: LensesToDisassociate
parameters.description: A list of lens aliases or ARNs to unapply to the review template. The wellarchitected lens cannot be unapplied. (string) --- The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1::lens/serverless. Note that some operations (such as ExportLens and CreateLensShare) are not permitted on Amazon Web Services official lenses. For custom lenses, this is the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-west-2:123456789012:lens/0123456789abcdef01234567890abcdef. Each lens is identified by its  LensSummary$LensAlias.

nested_items.name: Lenses
nested_items.description: The lenses applied to the review template.

nested_items.name: Notes
nested_items.description: The notes associated with the workload.

nested_items.name: QuestionCounts
nested_items.description: A count of how many total questions are answered and unanswered in the review template.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: An Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: TemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the review template.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The latest status of a review template.

nested_items.name: ShareInvitationId
nested_items.description: The ID assigned to the template share invitation.
